bug.author: ktj-code-debug
bug.summary: Links in the README.md of mlpack/mlpack not working.
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h4>README.md (mlpack repository)</denchmark-h>
1. Introduction
Tutorials http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-git/doxygen/tutorials.html API documentation http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-git/doxygen/index.html
4. Building mlpack from source
Building mlpack From Source http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-git/doxygen/build.html Building mlpack From Source on Windows http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-git/doxygen/build_windows.html
7. Further documentation
Tutorials http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-git/doxygen/tutorials.html API documentation http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-git/doxygen/index.html
<denchmark-h:h4>Description of problem</denchmark-h>
The following URL's not found on the server <denchmark-link:http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-git/doxygen/tutorials.html>http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-git/doxygen/tutorials.html</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-git/doxygen/index.html>http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-git/doxygen/index.html</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-git/doxygen/build.html>http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-git/doxygen/build.html</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-git/doxygen/build_windows.html>http://www.mlpack.org/docs/mlpack-git/doxygen/build_windows.html</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/abhinavsagar>@abhinavsagar</denchmark-link> I'm not sure the meaning of your comment. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ktj-code-debug>@ktj-code-debug</denchmark-link> thanks for the report; <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/pull/1808>#1808</denchmark-link> is already open to fix this.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mlpack/mlpack/pull/1808>#1808</denchmark-link> is merged, so I'm going to go ahead and close this. Thanks again for the report.
